# Now write the following code

.pull-left.w40[

Write this out inside the "code chunk" in your notes.

```{r codefig-first-plot, message=FALSE, fig.show="hide", fig.width=4, fig.height=3.5}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

p <- ggplot(data = gapminder, 
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, 
                          y = lifeExp))  


p + geom_point()
```
]

)
